response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you, worth $1,500,000. I am offering this unique item at a special price, which I believe will be highly attractive to you. My offer for this exceptional product is $1,200,000.

This price represents an excellent chance for you to secure an asset that aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. By accepting this offer, you will not only own a valuable piece but also benefit from a favorable transaction compared to its market value.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the terms of this offer. I am here to provide you with all the information you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
